channel.title: Reproducibility on R Doodles
channel.description: Recent content in Reproducibility on R Doodles

item.title: Reanalyzing data from Human Gut Microbiota from Autism Spectrum Disorder Promote Behavioral Symptoms in Mice
item.description: A very skeletal analysis of Sharon, G., Cruz, N.J., Kang, D.W., Gandal, M.J., Wang, B., Kim, Y.M., Zink, E.M., Casey, C.P., Taylor, B.C., Lane, C.J. and Bramer, L.M., 2019. Human Gut Microbiota from Autism Spectrum Disorder Promote Behavioral Symptoms in Mice. Cell, 177(6), pp.1600-1618. which got some attention on pubpeer. library(ggplot2) library(lmerTest) library(emmeans) library(lmtest) library(data.table) data_path <- "../data/Data from Human Gut Microbiota from Autism Spectrum Disorder Promote Behavioral Symptoms in Mice/Fig1" #data_path <- "data/Data from Human Gut Microbiota from Autism Spectrum Disorder Promote Behavioral Symptoms in Mice/Fig1" fn <- "Fig1EFGH_subset8.
